Windlord::

Windlord tried to stood up and walk towards the base but he fel=
l in the ground, Termitron was near in stasis lock. Windlord opened his com=
m link in all Chivtrons's frecuencies "I... ne.. help... I don't know ho...=
 long I can... Stan"

Windlord couldn't continue, but he was conceus and he=
 left opened his com link, in order to let other Chivtrons find him.
  ----=

.com 
  Sent: Sunday, June 03, 2001 5:26 PM

  The Maximals, Deemos, and McGowan's group should be far away by now.

=
  Burning Hammer: Aerotaur?

  Burning Hammer walked out and picked him up.=


  Burning Hammer: How many?

  He carried Aerotaue inside and put him int=
o a CR Chamber. My other 3 bots
  come in.

  Arrow: That battle was disgra=
ceful. They got the jump on us, and they won
  this time! Ridiculous! The i=
dea of those idiots beating us is madness! All
  because I don't have comma=
nd over the shields! I demand to be able to
  control those shields, and I =
want it right now, or I'm taking Zeniith and
  leaving.

  Perplex: I also =
want to be able to command the ship, Arrow is right.

  Arrow patted Perple=
x on the back and put his arm around him.

  Burning Hammer: I think I also=
 need that, or else some of us may end up
  perishing in the next battle. I=
 have to agree with them.

  Zeni: Can I have power over the shields?

  Ar=
row: If I have power over them, then you have power over them, you really
 =
 don't need it. Well? What's it going to be? I get my shield control, as do=
es
  Perplex and Burning Hammer, or we leave...
